value:
Lord Julius has certainly taken a
fancy to Ishtar. I wonder when he will
finally ask for her hand...

I am of House Velthomer, same as
the royal family. And House Friege is
one of Grannvale's most prestigious.

I swear...I am surrounded by
incompetent fools.

There is none more suited or
qualified to be Lord Julius's bride
than Ishtar.

Tailtiu was a waste of space. I made
her suffer day in and day out. Hoho!
Those were such amusing times.

This hovel barely qualifies as a
castle, but I suppose I could deign
to visit every now and then.

I, Hilda, will send you kicking and
screaming into the depths of hell!

Yes, just like that. Surround them
on all sides and do not let a single
one escape with their life!

What sort of trickery is this? Was I
not victorious? I deserve my reward!
Hoho. Not bad, not bad...

What is it now? You require my aid?
Fine. I suppose I have to do everything
myself...

You again? You should know better
than to bother someone who is
drowning their sorrows.$k$pYour needs do not concern me. I am
but a widow wishing to grieve in
peace at the bottom of her bottle.$k$pMy husband, Bloom, and my son,
Ishtore, both slain by the resistance...
Ulster stolen. How much must I bear?$k$pAll that remains of House Friege are
myself and Ishtar...and it's all the fault
of that insipid brat Seliph!$k$pDoes my tortured soul please you? I
am not here to be your entertainment.
Begone before I lose my temper...
それ
ふん！
ぎゃあっ
What was that?
Hellfire!
Is it to be revenge?
My hand will end you.
I will kill you all!
How...dare you...
*Arrogant laugh*
I am Hilda, of House Velthomer. Just like the imperial family.
Keep your hands to yourself if you hope to keep your hands at all.
If Lord Julius were to make Ishtar his princess... What a wonderful match that would be.
Seliph and his pathetic little army are enemies of House Friege.
Tailtiu was a waste of space. I made her life miserable and I would do it again.
I will avenge my father, my husband, and my son... I will see their killers burn!
If you mean to take advantage of my skills, you had best know what you're doing.
I suppose so.
Fine.
Let me handle this.
